svg.title: Somesh Diwan — Software Developer | Backend Systems | AI/ML

g.text: 🚀 EXPLORE • LEARN • CONTRIBUTE • CONNECT WITH IDEAS AND CODE • IF YOU ENJOY MY PROJECTS, DROP A ⭐ AND SHARE • OPEN SOURCE IS HOW WE GROW AS ENGINEERS • THANKS FOR STOPPING BY AND BEING PART OF THE JOURNEY 💻

• WELCOME TO MY GITHUB • I’M SOMESH DIWAN • SOFTWARE DEVELOPER • JAVA • SPRING BOOT • BACKEND DEVELOPMENT • SYSTEM DESIGN • AI and MACHINE LEARNING • EXPLORING IDEAS THAT SCALE • OPEN SOURCE PROJECTS • CLEAN CODE • COLLABORATE • INNOVATE • DROP A ⭐ IF YOU ENJOY THE WORK • FOLLOW FOR NEW BUILDS • ISSUES PRs ALWAYS WELCOME •
WELCOME • SWE • SDE • BACKEND • JAVA • SPRING BOOT • AI/ML •
